attributes.action: Give people taking A-Levels and GCSEs their predicted grades due to COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Many children are stressed due to their GCSEs being so close. And with COVID-19 being a worldwide pandemic, children should not be expected to be able to revise enough to do well in their exams. Work rate is being halted due to time off school and being unable to teach themselves the syllabus.
attributes.background: Give children their predicted grades for any upcoming exams in the summer.

rejection.details:
Decisions about exams are a matter for exam boards and individual schools, and are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
